name: discrete-slider
author: Sachin K.C.
preview: A responsive, Tailwind CSS-based discrete range slider component for React.

props.name: min
props.description: The minimum selectable value of the slider.

props.name: max
props.description: The maximum selectable value of the slider.

props.name: step
props.description: The step interval between slider positions.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The default value displayed when the slider is initialized.

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback triggered when the slider value changes.
